MASCodeService.Description: The Account service provides methods for clients to load existing accounts and their account views from the MetraNet database. These methods do not provide create and update functions. Account and view creation and update functions are provided by the AccountCreation <accountcreation_service.htm> service.

Interface.Name: AccountService
Interface.Description: The Account service provides methods for clients to load existing accounts and their account views from the MetraNet database.

MASCodeService.Description: The Aggregate Metrics Processor (AMP) performs complex rating decisions by analyzing aggregated usage and modifying charges on the basis of that analysis.

Interface.Name: AmpService
Interface.Description: The Aggregate Metrics Processor (AMP) performs complex rating decisions by analyzing aggregated usage and modifying charges on the basis of that analysis.

MASCodeService.Description: Provides access to Credit Notes functionality

Interface.Name: CreditNoteService
Interface.Description: Provides access to Credit Notes functionality

MASCodeService.Description: Provides access to interval information

Interface.Name: IntervalManagementService
Interface.Description: Provides access to interval information

MASCodeService.Description: Provides access to the MT Auditing functionality

Interface.Name: AuditLogService
Interface.Description: Provides access to the MT Auditing functionality.

MASCodeService.Description: The Subscription service provides all the methods for clients to display, add, update, and delete subscriptions for accounts.

Interface.Name: SubscriptionService
Interface.Description: The Subscription service provides all the methods for clients to display, add, update, and delete subscriptions for accounts.

MASCodeService.Description: The PriceListService defines a set of methods that provide access to retrieve, update and otherwise manage shared price lists, and it provides access to the rates associated with particular subscriptions, group subscriptions, or product offerings.

Interface.Name: PriceListService
Interface.Description: The PriceListService defines a set of methods that provide access to retrieve, update and otherwise manage shared price lists, and it provides access to the rates associated with particular subscriptions, group subscriptions, or product offerings.

MASCodeService.Description: Usage History Service

Interface.Name: UsageHistoryService
Interface.Description: Usage History Service.

MASCodeService.Description: UDR Loader Service

Interface.Name: UDRLoaderService
Interface.Description: UDR Loader Service.

MASCodeService.Description: The AuthServices service provides methods related to authentication and authorization. These are methods to log on as an account, generate a ticket (that is, impersonate an account), validate a ticket, and invalidate a ticket.

Interface.Name: AuthService
Interface.Description: The AuthServices service provides methods related to authentication and authorization. These are methods to log on as an account, generate a ticket (that is, impersonate an account), validate a ticket, and invalidate a ticket.

MASCodeService.Description: The ProductOfferingService defines a set of methods that provide access to retrieve, update and otherwise manage product offerings.

Interface.Name: ProductOfferingService
Interface.Description: The ProductOfferingService defines a set of methods that provide access to retrieve, update and otherwise manage product offerings.

MASCodeService.Description: The AccountTemplate service provides methods for clients to retrieve, add, update and delete account templates in the MetraNet system.

Interface.Name: AccountTemplateService
Interface.Description: The AccountTemplate service provides methods for clients to retrieve, add, update and delete account templates in the MetraNet system.

MASCodeService.Description: The GroupSubscription service provides methods for clients to display, add, update and delete group subscriptions for corporate accounts.

Interface.Name: GroupSubscriptionService
Interface.Description: The GroupSubscription service provides methods for clients to display, add, update and delete group subscriptions for corporate accounts.

MASCodeService.Description: The Notification service provides methods for handling notifications

Interface.Name: NotificationService
Interface.Description: The Notification service provides methods for handling notifications

MASCodeService.Description: Ticketing Service

Interface.Name: TicketingService
Interface.Description: The Notification service provides methods for handling notifications

MASCodeService.Description: The File Landing Service (FLS) is the process by which data files are received, tracked, processed, and reviewed for processing, usually by MetraFlow.

Interface.Name: EntityInstanceService
Interface.Description: The File Landing Service (FLS) is the process by which data files are received, tracked, processed, and reviewed for processing, usually by MetraFlow.

MASCodeService.Description: The ProductCatalogService is a collection of web service methods that provide access to the product catalog. These methods allow for the retrieval of all the priceable item type metadata as well as to create, retrieve, update and delete priceable item templates. This service also provides methods to manage calendar definitions within the MetraNet system.

Interface.Name: ProductCatalogService
Interface.Description: The ProductCatalogService is a collection of web service methods that provide access to the product catalog.

MASCodeService.Description: MetadataService can be used to obtain metadata information for BMEs.

Interface.Name: MetadataService
Interface.Description: MetadataService can be used to obtain metadata information for BMEs.

MASCodeService.Description: The StandardRepository is also exposed as a WCF service called the RepositoryService (hosted in MetraNet Activity Services). Server-side components can use the StandardRepository APIs directly, without going through the RepositoryService

Interface.Name: RepositoryService
Interface.Description: The StandardRepository is also exposed as a WCF service called the RepositoryService (hosted in MetraNet Activity Services). Server-side components can use the StandardRepository APIs directly, without going through the RepositoryService.

MASCodeService.Description: Division Management Service

Interface.Name: DivisionManagementService
Interface.Description: Division Management Service.

MASCodeService.Description: Method to handle account disputes

Interface.Name: DisputeService
Interface.Description: Method to handle account disputes

MASCodeService.Description: The Adjustment service provides methods for making transactional adjustments and miscellaneous adjustments. It provides operational behavior for processing adjusted transactions in the system: such as specifying the details for a particular adjusted transaction, approving an adjusted transaction, and denying/deleting an adjusted transaction.

Interface.Name: AdjustmentsService
Interface.Description: The Adjustment service provides methods for making transactional adjustments and miscellaneous adjustments.

MASCodeService.Description: The NonStandardChargeService service provides methods for making nonstandard charges, approving nonstandard charges, and denying nonstandard charges.

Interface.Name: NonStandardChargeService
Interface.Description: The NonStandardChargeService service provides methods for making nonstandard charges, approving nonstandard charges, and denying nonstandard charges.

Interface.Name: ScheduleAdapterService
Interface.Description: Schedule Adapter Service.

Interface.Name: UsmService
Interface.Description: USM Service.

MASCodeService.Description: ata Export Reports are designed for the flexible creation of custom flat-file data that can be exported to third-party tools such as accounting feeds.

Interface.Name: DataExportReportManagementService
Interface.Description: Data Export Reports are designed for the flexible creation of custom flat-file data that can be exported to third-party tools such as accounting feeds.

MASCodeService.Description: Relationship Properties define the relationships between entity instances. Entity instances can belong to the same entity group or a different entity group (providing that they belong to the same namespace and extension).

Interface.Name: RelationshipService
Interface.Description: Relationship Properties define the relationships between entity instances. Entity instances can belong to the same entity group or a different entity group (providing that they belong to the same namespace and extension).

Interface.Name: SpecificationsService
